thread.title: Naomi Campbell, Kate Moss, Lady Gaga, Gucci - Style.com News
thread.title_full: Naomi Campbell, Kate Moss, Lady Gaga, Gucci - Style.com News

author: Lorenzo McClellan
title: Naomi Campbell, Kate Moss, Lady Gaga, Gucci - Style.com News
text:
Billy Farrell / BFA.com
Campbell vs. Gaga…
The match of the century? Naomi Campbell will appear on the next season of American Horror Story: Hotel , where a major plot point will concern a feud with Lady Gaga’s character on the show. Which pop culture icon will prevail? We’ll have to tube in to see. [ Vulture ]
Rebekka Bay’s new job…
Rebekka Bay’s tenure at Gap may have been stormy, but six months after leaving the company she has landed as the head designer at Everlane. Will she manage to expand the profile of the online apparel startup—or even make it profitable? [ Business of Fashion ]
Gucci moves in to Dover Street…
In a sure sign that the radical changes Alessandro Michele has brought to Gucci are being noticed throughout the fashion world, the storied brand has been invited to sell at London’s Dover Street Market. “I wouldn’t be open to every Tom, Dick, or Harry corporate brand,” said Adrian Joffe, Dover Street Market’s CEO. But the new Gucci, he suggested, is something completely different. [ WWD ]
Goldin’s early days…
While Nan Goldin’s The Ballad of Sexual Dependency is one of the most famous photography books of all time, her earlier work is substantially less well known. In fact, the artist discovered a large trove of her work from the 1970s only last year. Now you can see the rare images at a major exhibition in Turin. [ Dazed ]
All good things…
Suspicions about Kate Moss’ marriage have been simmering for a while: She and husband Jamie Hince haven’t been spotted together since May. But now it seems that things are ultimately over for the couple. [ The Telegraph ]
